testsuite.name: testcases.TC_02_ChangePassword
testsuite.system-out: Orange HRM website is loaded Browser window is maximized userName is entered in the text-box password is entered in the text-box Login button is clicked Admin menu is clicked User Management option is clicked Useres option is clicked Edit user option is clicked New password is entered Confirm password is entered Save button is clicked Logout dropdown is clicked Logout is selected from the dropdown Adella is entered as UserName in a text-box abcd@123 is entered as Password in a text-box Login button is clicked
